name: OTAMAMANIA! (extremely early prototype)
description:
OTAMAMANIA! INFO

This is NOT a complete game! This is barely even a prototype. I only uploaded the game this early to see how HTML5 files could be uploaded.

The story/structure for OTAMAMANIA! isn't something I've decided too much yet. It might not even end up becoming a full game! (Due to burnout and laziness from me) I will however say that the basis of the game is: You're an otamatone (wikipedia page about the instrument here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Otamatone; I DO NOT OWN THE NAME OR ANY RIGHTS TO DO WITH THE OTAMATONE INSTRUMENT, PLEASE DON'T DMCA ME) who lives in a friendly village with their peaceful neighbors. You will talk to and complete many tasks for the villagers, including, finding resources, buying food, and fighting un-friendly enemies/monsters. Each task you complete, you will either be rewarded with hats that boost your performance and appearance, or coins, depending on the task. Yeah, thats all I have in terms of future gameplay ideas so far. The prototype is, once again, barely even a prototype. All it is so far is a movement system with a player following camera, directional idle animations,

 

(I know the back view looks a bit... uhh..), and some sprites I threw together that will be used in the future for environments/areas. Therefore, please do not expect much out of the game so far, and only give criticism based off of the artwork and the movement system.
